document_data.name: Althea Mecatoris
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Althea Mecatoris''' was the matriarch of [[House Mecatoris]] and one of the merchant lords of [[Sambral]], one of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|8}}
document_data.Description: Althea was a tall, thin human female with steel-colored hair.
document_data.Relationships: Althea was the mother of [[Davien Mecatoris]].
